name: src/connection/constants.js
useTestcloud
description:
Method to set Cozify test-cloud as an cloud API host.
Must be called at the early stage of SDK usage, otherwise production
cloud is used.

name: COMMANDS_TYPE
description:
Enumeration of supported API commands, that could be
 USER_LOGIN, HUB_KEYS, REFRESH_AUTHKEY, CLOUD_IP, CLOUD_META, POLL, CMD_DEVICE

name: COMMANDS_TYPE
description: COMMAND_TYPE

properties.name: localUrl
properties.description: Optional localUrl for direct hub access

properties.name: config
properties.description: Optional config that might have 'timeout' or 'responseType' configs to be used over defaults,

properties.name: data
properties.description: Optional data to be sent over url or body parameters (depending command)

properties.name: hubId
properties.description: Optional hub Id when messaging to hub

name: CLOUD_CONNECTION_STATE_TYPE
description:
Enumeration of cloud connection state, that could be
UNCONNECTED, UNAUTHENTICATED, UNAUTHORIZED, OBSOLETE_API_VERSION, LATE_PAYMENT or CONNECTED

name: HUB_CONNECTION_STATE_TYPE
description:
Enumeration of HUB connection state, that could be
UNCONNECTED, UNAUTHENTICATED, UNAUTHORIZED, OBSOLETE_API_VERSION, REMOTE or LOCAL

name: src/connection/send-retry.js
src/connection/send-utilities.js
src/connection/send.js
sendAll
description: Send multiple requests

name: send
description: Send method for REST API
examples:
send( {command: COMMANDS.CMD_DEVICE, authKey: authKey, hubKey: hubKey, data:[{id:deviceId, state:state}] })
  .then((response) => {...});

name: src/connection/state.js
setCloudConnectionState
description: Change Cloud connection state

name: getCloudConnectionState
description: Get Cloud connection state

name: setHubConnectionState
description: Change hub connection state

name: getHubConnectionState
description: Get hub connection state by hub id

name: src/devices/device.js
sendDeviceStateCmd
description: Device state command to be sent

name: sendDeviceCmd
description: General device command to be sent

name: unpairDevice
description: Unpair device

name: identifyDevice
description: Identify device

name: setDeviceMeta
description: Identify device

name: src/devices/devices.js
getDevices
description: Get devices of all selected hubs

name: getPairingDevices
description: Get pairing devices of all selected hubs

name: getHubDevices
description: Get devices of given hub

name: getHubPairingDevices
description: Get pairing devices of given hub

name: devicesDeltaHandler
description: Device handler for poll delta results

name: pairingDevicesDeltaHandler
description: Device handler for poll delta results

name: src/hubs/constants.js
HUB_STATES
description:
Enumeration of hub state, that could be
UNCLAIMED, CLAIMED, TOO_NEW_VERSION, NO_ACCESS or CONNECTED

name: src/hubs/hubs.js
getHubs
description: Helper to get current hubs from state

name: storedUser
description: Helper to get current user from state

name: startDiscoveringHubs
description:
Start discovering hubs every DISCOVERY_INTERVAL_MS
Sequence includes requests of hub-keys, remote meta-infos, lan-ips and local meta-infos

name: stopDiscoveringHubs
description: Stop discovering hubs

name: ignorePairingByIds
description: Set pairing ignore flag of given device in given hub

name: startPairingById
description: Start pairing on given hub

params.name: reset
params.description: set true for full scan, false if delta only

name: stopPairingById
description: Stop pairing on given hub

name: stopPairings
description: Stop pairing on all hubs

name: doPoll
description:
Do poll on given hub if hub connection is ok.
Remote polls are executed only every second call.

params.name: reset
params.description: set true for full scan, false if delta only

name: startPollingById
description: Start polling on given hub

name: stopPollingById
description: Stop polling on given hub

name: selectHubById
description: Select hub by id, starts hub polling

params.name: poll
params.description: flag to start polling when connected, defaults to false

name: unSelectHubById
description: Unselect hub by id, stops hub polling

name: unSelectHubs
description: Unselect hubs, stops hub pollings

name: connectHubByTokens
description: Connect to the given hub - local or remote.

params.name: discovery
params.description: true to make remote discovery, false to start without discovery

params.name: sync
params.description: true to wait local hubs reply (in case of discovery), false to start with remote connection

return.description: current hubs, should not reject never

name: src/hubs/modbus.js
storedUser
description: Helper to get current user from state

name: getHubs
description: Helper to get current hubs from state

name: src/hubs/zwave.js
storedUser
description: Helper to get current user from state

name: getHubs
description: Helper to get current hubs from state

name: doZwaveInclusion
description: Start zwave inclusion on given hub

return.description: that resolves true if device found and false if not

name: stopZwaveInclusion
description: Stop zwave inclusion on given hub

name: exclusionStopped
description: Test if zwave of given hub is enabled

name: doZwaveExclusion
description: Start zwave exclusion on given hub

return.description: that resolves true if device found and false if not

name: stopZwaveExclusion
description: Stop zwave exclusion on given hub

name: isZwaveEnabled
description: Test if zwave of given hub is enabled

return.description: that resolves true if zwave is enabled

name: healZwave
description: Start healing of Zwave network

name: getZwaveNodes
description: Get Z-Wave nodes

return.description: that resolves node list when done

name: checkIsFailedZWaveNode
description: Get Z-Wave nodes

return.description: that resolves node list when done

name: removeFailedZWaveNode
description: Get Z-Wave nodes

return.description: that resolves node list when done

name: getZWaveNodeParameter
description: Get Z-Wave node parameter

return.description: that resolves node list when done

name: setZWaveNodeParameter
description: Set Z-Wave node parameter

return.description: that resolves node list when done

name: src/rooms/constants.js
src/rooms/rooms.js
getRooms
description: Get rooms of all selected hubs

name: getHubRooms
description: Get rooms of given hub

name: addRoom
description:
Add room to given hub
do not usr store.dispatch(roomsState.actions.addRoom(hubId, room)) as rooms are coming back in delta

name: editRoom
description:
Edit room of given hub
do not usr store.dispatch(roomsState.actions.editRoom(hubId, room)) as rooms are coming back in delta

name: removeRoom
description: Remove given room of given hub

name: roomsDeltaHandler
description: Rooms handler for poll delta results

name: src/schemas/schemas.js
src/store.js
store
description: store as a redux state store

name: watchChanges
description: Helper to subscribe to store changes

params.name: path
params.description: attribute path to watch changes, e.g. 'user.state'

params.name: optionalStore
params.description: optional store for unit tests etc.

name: src/user/constants.js
LANGUAGES
description:
Enumeration of language, that could be
NONE, EN_UK or FI_FI

name: USER_STATES
description:
Enumeration of user state, that could be
WAITING_LANGUAGE, LANGUAGE_SET, WAITING_LOGIN, LOGIN_DONE, WAITING_EULA, EULA_ACCEPTED, AUTHENTICATED or LOGGED_OUT

name: ROLES
description:
Enumeration of ROLES, that could be
ADMIN, USER, GUEST or ANONYMOUS

name: src/user/user.js
changeLanguage
description: User action to change current language

name: acceptEula
description: User action to accept EULA

name: doPwLogin
description: User action to log in

name: setAuthenticated
description: User action to set user token

name: getUserState
description: Get state of user state-machine

name: src/utils.js
isNodeInUse
description: Helper to check if run environment is Node

name: getTextFromNode
description: Helper method to strip HTML presentation from string

name: b64DecodeUnicode
description: Helper method to get HTML presentation from unicode decoded base64 string

name: urlBase64Decode
description: Helper method to Base64 decode

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "cozify-sdk",
  "version": "1.0.30",
  "description": "JavaScript SDK for Cozify REST API",
  "author": "tech-admin",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": "cozify/JS-SDK",
  "node": "dist/sdk.node.js",
  "browser": "dist/sdk.browser.js",
  "module": "dist/sdk.es.js",
  "main": "dist/sdk.node.js",
  "jsnext:main": "dist/sdk.es.js",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=8",
    "npm": ">=5"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rollup -c",
    "start": "rollup -c -w",
    "test": "jest src",
    "test:alarms": "jest src/reducers/alarms.test.js",
    "test:connections": "jest src/reducers/connections.test.js",
    "test:devices": "jest src/reducers/devices.test.js",
    "test:hubs": "jest src/reducers/hubs.test.js",
    "test:pairings": "jest src/reducers/pairings.test.js",
    "test:idea": "jest src/reducers/idea.test.js",
    "test:plans": "jest src/reducers/plans.test.js",
    "test:rooms": "jest src/reducers/rooms.test.js",
    "test:user": "jest src/reducers/user.test.js",
    "test:watch": "jest src --watch --notify",
    "cover": "jest src --coverage",
    "flow": "flow",
    "flow:check": "flow check ./src/",
    "flow:status": "flow status",
    "flow:coverage": "flow-coverage-report --config .flowcoverage.json",
    "flow:deps": "flow-typed install",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/flow-remove-types src/ -d docs/src/ -p | ./node_modules/.bin/esdoc | rm -rf docs/src/",
    "lint": "eslint src",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --fix",
    "deploy": "gh-pages -d example/build",
    "prepare": "npm run build",
    "predeploy": "cd example && npm install && npm run build",
    "precommit": "npm run flow && npm run lint && npm run test",
    "prepublish": "npm run flow && npm run test && npm run docs && npm run build",
    "db": "npx json-server --port=3001 --watch db.json"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.6.4",
    "@babel/core": "^7.6.4",
    "@babel/node": "^7.6.3",
    "@babel/plugin-external-helpers": "^7.2.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-object-rest-spread": "^7.6.2",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-flow-strip-types": "^7.6.3",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.6.2",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.6.3",
    "@babel/preset-flow": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.6.3",
    "acorn": "^6.4.2",
    "axios": "^0.21.1",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.0.3",
    "babel-plugin-add-module-exports": "^1.0.2",
    "babel-plugin-lodash": "^3.3.4",
    "deep-freeze": "0.0.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-flow-type-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^6.6.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^14.0.0",
    "eslint-config-standard": "^12.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-flowtype": "^3.13.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.18.2",
    "eslint-plugin-jest": "^22.21.0",
    "eslint-plugin-json": "^1.4.0",
    "eslint-plugin-node": "^8.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^4.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.16.0",
    "eslint-plugin-standard": "^4.0.1",
    "flow-bin": "^0.95.1",
    "flow-typed": "^2.6.2",
    "jest": "^27.0.6",
    "rollup": "^1.26.0",
    "rollup-all": "^1.6.16",
    "rollup-jest": "0.0.2",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^4.3.3",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^9.3.4",
    "rollup-plugin-cpy": "^1.1.0",
    "rollup-plugin-flow": "^1.1.1",
    "rollup-plugin-flow-entry": "^0.3.3",
    "rollup-plugin-json": "^4.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-node-builtins": "^2.1.2",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^4.2.4",
    "rollup-plugin-npm": "^2.0.0",
    "rollup-plugin-replace": "^2.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-terser": "^5.1.2",
    "rollup-plugin-uglify": "^6.0.3"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "dependencies": {
    "@apollo/client": "^3.0.0-beta.43",
    "@apollo/link-ws": "^2.0.0-beta.3",
    "@reduxjs/toolkit": "^1.6.0",
    "axios-retry": "^3.1.2",
    "core-js": "^3.3.6",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "get-value": "^3.0.1",
    "graphql": "^14.6.0",
    "graphql-normalizr": "^2.10.1",
    "graphql-subscriptions-client": "^0.12.0",
    "is-retry-allowed": "^1.2.0",
    "lodash": "^4.17.21",
    "normalizr": "^3.6.0",
    "redux": "^4.0.5",
    "redux-devtools-extension": "^2.13.8",
    "subscriptions-transport-ws": "^0.9.16",
    "uuid": "^7.0.3"
  }
}
name: package.json
